title: DevOps Engineer
body:
RIDDLE&CODE is looking for a DevOps Engineer with passion for blockchain and crypto technologies.

Superior: Chief Information Officer

Direct Reports: Chief Information Officer

RIDDLE&CODE is Europe’s leading company for blockchain interface solutions. It is one of the few - if not the only company - which has developed its own blockchain based hardware & software products that bridge the digital and the physical world. RIDDLE&CODE offers the opportunity to work at the forefront of blockchain and cryptography products and to expand your skills while driving and developing cutting-edge technology.

Groundbreaking wallet design, innovative blockchain IOT solutions, groundbreaking wallet design and technology around identity, integrity and transaction are in the center of our current development efforts. More information can be found at www.riddleandcode.com

To make sure that - besides a unique job environment - you’ll have the time of your life RIDDLE&CODE is located in Vienna/Austria which – for the 10th time in a row – has been awarded the city with the best quality of life in the world!

RIDDLE&CODE is looking for a DevOps Engineer with passion.

Qualification

Experienced In operating distributed systems

Experienced in operating PKI and access management

Experienced In setting up and operating high availability

Experienced working with security concepts such as root of trust, symmetric and public key protocols & crypto cores, security middleware and key provisioning

Experienced In administration of Linux/Unix operating systems and their permission systems.

Knowledge of standard cryptographic algorithms, security protocols and their implementation aspects will be highly valued

At least 3+ years of relevant experience

System architecture and specification background

Ability to write precise documents to support processes and a sustainable growth

Ability to set up new or improve given processes

Applies configuration management, operations management, and security technologies

Ability to communicate efficiently at all levels

Ambitious to build up systems and Infrastructure

Who you will work with

Work as part of a collaborative team of entrepreneurial people who operate with a young yet globally recognized blockchain technology spearhead company.

Work hand in hand with technical experts of various domains (Internal and external)

Directly work with many of the biggest players in various industries: luxury goods, energy, production, banks, and exchanges

Duties & Responsibilities

Set up, operate, administrate, and extend

distributed systems around the globe

Trusted Execution Environments (TEE) for the purpose of confidential executions and processes

monitoring of the infrastructure

local and cloud infrastructure to support the demands of a growing company

Definition and adjustment of operational processes to support SLAs

Starting as a team member we plan to expand your responsibilities over time to eventually build up and lead your own project team.

Compensation

The law obliges us to state gross salary guidelines of the collective agreement for this position (at least € 3.139,- p.m. to € 4.209,- for a ST2 rating and 38.5 hours per week or at least € 2.518,- p.m to € 3.449,- p.m. for a ST1 rating and 38.5 hours per week).

We strive to offer compensation that corresponds to your personal qualification, your experience and in line with the current market.

CONTACT US

We are very much looking forward to receiving your application, please send your CV with Ref: DevOps Engineer, to jobs@riddleandcode.com.
